overview: With sex you get eggroll! The evil Ninja Queen has returned from outer space and is hell bent on ruling the world. This time she has an army of ninja zombies and giant green space creatures on her side! Only the Kung-Fu Girls, led by their new master Yu Suk Wang, can stop her evil plans. You'll stand up and cheer aloud as they fearlessly use their young throats, pussies and gaping assholes to save the universe!
tagline: They'll Kick Your Ass & You'll Love It!
title: Kung-Fu Girls 2
